jobs.title: Substitute Bus Driver Trainee
jobs.status: On-Call/As NeededMinimum QualificationsMinimum age of 21 years.Have no more than 100 points recorded on past driving record.  No more than two at-fault accidents, two citations, or a combination of one at-fault accident and one citation, in a 24 month period.Hold and maintain a Utah Commercial Drivers License.  Driver Training will be provided if candidate needs to obtain the Utah Commercial Drivers License.The salary for this position is assigned to the BD Salary ScheduleAFTER completion of training.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkBD Salary Schedule.APPLICANTS ARE REQUIRED TO ATTACH/UPLOAD A COPY OF THEIR CURRENT DRIVING RECORD WITH THE APPLICATIONA copy of the driving record can be obtained from the Department of Motor Vehicles.Attachment(s):Bus Driver & Sub Bus Driver.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version

jobs.title: Head Boys Wrestling Coach (no teaching assignment)
jobs.description: This Head Boys Wrestling Coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Mike Bair, at mike.bair@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.

jobs.title: Head Girls Cross Country Coach (no teaching assignment)
jobs.description: This Head Girls Cross Country coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Gabi Hasenbeck,  at gabi.hasenbeck@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.

jobs.title: Elementary Grade Level Teacher on Special Assignment
jobs.status: Full Time, 1 FTELevel 2 Teacher on Special Assignment includes a temporary/at-will contract for 10 extra days on contract.EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCEA minimum of a Bachelor's Degree.  Candidates who have successfully completed a minimum of 3 years general classroom teaching experience in WCSD are preferred.   Must be a teacher in good standing with no documented performance or conduct concerns with in the past three years per WCSD policy 1120.3.1.  Candidates must have a record of effective collaboration and have experience working with at-risk students.CANDIDATES MUST PROVIDE THE FOLLOWING FOR INTERVIEW CONSIDERATION:*Letter of recommendation from current supervisor*Most current assessment data demonstrating growthCERTIFICATES, LICENSES, REGISTRATIONSActive Utah Teaching License with proper endorsement for assignment.  ESL endorsement would be beneficial.The salary for this position is assigned to the TT Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkTT Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):TSA Elementary Grade Level.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
